#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(Server)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -w -static-libgcc -std=gnu99")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG} -g -ggdb -D__DEBUG")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO} -O2 -g -ggdb -D__RELWITHDEBINFO")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE} -O2 -g -ggdb -D__RELEASE")

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -w -static-libgcc -std=gnu++11 ")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG} -g -ggdb -D__DEBUG")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO} -O2 -g -ggdb -D__RELWITHDEBINFO")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE} -O2 -g -ggdb -D__RELEASE")

add_executable(Server Source/Cxx/Base/Config.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/Logger.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/Loop.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/LuaState.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/ZeroMessageQueue.cpp

Source/Cxx/Base/Process.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/Redis.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/Session.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/TcpConnection.cpp
Source/Cxx/Base/TcpServer.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/BackstageServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/CacheIntegratedServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/DatabaseIntegratedServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/DispatcherServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/LoggerServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/ManagerClientServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Intf/ManagerServiceIntf.cpp
Source/Cxx/Libs/lrapidjson/Document.cpp
Source/Cxx/Libs/lrapidjson/rapidjson.cpp
Source/Cxx/Libs/lrapidjson/Schema.cpp
Source/Cxx/Libs/lrapidjson/values.cpp
Source/Cxx/Libs/lsystem.cpp
Source/Cxx/Server/Server.cpp
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/proto.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/context.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/map.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/rmessage.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/stringpool.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/decode.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/wmessage.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/alloc.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/array.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/register.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/bootstrap.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/varint.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/src/pattern.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/pbc/binding/lua/pbc-lua.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/tolua/tolua_map.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/tolua/tolua_is.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/tolua/tolua_push.c
Source/Cxx/Libs/tolua/tolua_to.c

Source/Cxx/Libs/pb.c)

include_directories(/usr/local/include /usr/include /usr/include/mysql ./Source/Cxx/Libs)
target_link_libraries(Server -L/usr/local/lib/ -L/usr/local/lib64/ -L/usr/lib -L/usr/lib64 -L/usr/lib64/mysql -ltolua++ -ljemalloc -luv -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lhiredis -lmysqlclient -lzmq -lmysqlpp -llog4cplus -lluajit-5.1 "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
